data.comment: The match is underway in Marseille.
Free kick Marseille.
In the minute 2, Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Metz to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Marseille in the half of Metz.
Alvaro Gonzalez (Marseille) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Eric Wattellier awards Metz a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Marseille.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Dario Benedetto (Marseille) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Metz have a goal kick.
Marseille are coming forward and Dimitri Payet gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Metz at Orange Velodrome.
Eric Wattellier awards the away team a throw-in.
In Marseille Marseille's Dario Benedetto is caught offside.
In the minute 18, Dario Benedetto for Marseille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Marseille.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Habib Maiga is booked for the away team.
In the minute 26, Marseille will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Metz.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Marseille have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Marseille's Dario Benedetto misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 36, Eric Wattellier awards Metz a goal kick.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Metz.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Metz.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 39, Marseille's Dario Benedetto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Goal kick for Metz at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 40, In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Habib Maiga of Metz gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
In the minute 42, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Marseille.
Dario Benedetto (Marseille) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Metz defenders.
In the minute 43, Metz's Ibrahima Niane is whistled for offside at Orange Velodrome.
Eric Wattellier signals a Marseille throw-in in Metz's half.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Metz at Orange Velodrome.
Eric Wattellier blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 47, Metz are pushing forward but Fabien Centtonze's finish is wide of the goal.
Eric Wattellier awards Marseille a goal kick.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Metz.
In the minute 48, In Marseille Metz attack through Ibrahima Niane. The finish is off target, however.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Eric Wattellier blows against Metz's Ibrahima Niane for offside.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Marseille in the half of Metz.
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Metz are coming forward and Ibrahima Niane gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Florian Thauvin of Marseille gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Victorien Angban (Metz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Farid Boulaya of Metz is pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
In the minute 58, Marseille to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Marseille are pushing forward but Dimitri Payet's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
In the minute 60, Metz have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Marseille.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Eric Wattellier signals a Metz throw-in in Marseille's half.
In the minute 66, Marseille's Boubacar Kamara breaks free at Orange Velodrome. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Metz at Orange Velodrome.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
In the minute 69, Metz's Farid Boulaya misses with an attempt on goal.
Eric Wattellier awards Marseille a goal kick.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Marseille.
Can Metz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Marseille's half?
Ibrahima Niane puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 71, Great play from Matthieu Udol to set up the goal.
Metz have a goal kick.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Free kick Metz.
The away team have replaced Ibrahima Niane with Habib Diallo. This is the first substitution made today by Vincent Hognon.
In the minute 77, Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a first substitution, with Saif-Eddine Khaoui replacing Yuto Nagatomo.
The home team replace Valentin Rongier with Valere Germain.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick Metz.
Eric Wattellier waits before resuming play because Farid Boulaya for Metz is still down.
Eric Wattellier awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Andre Villas-Boas is making the team's third substitution at Orange Velodrome with Nemanja Radonjic replacing Florian Thauvin.
Pape Alassane Gueye is replacing Boubacar Kamara for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Andre Villas-Boas (Marseille) is making a fifth substitution, with Maxime Lopez replacing Duje Caleta Car.
In the minute 86, Marseille's Dario Benedetto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Metz have a goal kick.
Pape Ndiaga Yade is on a sub for Opa Nguette for Metz.
In the minute 87, Metz's Farid Boulaya looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Farid Boulaya, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Warren Tchimbembe is the substitute for Metz.
Throw-in Marseille.
In the minute 88, Habib Maiga for the away team is judged to be offside.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Metz's Pape Ndiaga Yade gets in a shot on goal at Orange Velodrome. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Metz.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Habib Maiga for Metz drives towards goal at Orange Velodrome. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Eric Wattellier blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Nemanja Radonjic.
Nemanja Radonjic with an assist there.
Kiki is replacing Victorien Angban for Metz at Orange Velodrome.
